turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can you order me coffee at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like me to order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Find one near my work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's one a few blocks away at Reseda and Nordhoff in Northridge.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a caramel frappucino blended coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh tell them don't put whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would it also be possible to put honey and lessen the sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sure I can make that request.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Just charge it to my account I have with them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Give me a few minutes to order your drink right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at Starbucks located at Reseda and Nordhoff. It will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: By the way, your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
